programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: No. 19 Michigan (5-1) takes on No. 2 Penn State (6-0) at Beaver Stadium. The Wolverines rebounded from their first loss of the season by beating Indiana 27-20. The Nittany Lions come off a bye, but they moved up in the AP rankings to the No. 2 slot.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: No. 5 Washington plays Arizona State in Week 7. The Huskies pushed their record to 6-0 following a 38-7 win over California. Washington is holding opponents to just 10 points per game. The Sun Devils aim to rebound from a 34-24 loss to Stanford.

programme.title: College Football

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: A Pac-12 meeting has the 4-3 Buffaloes taking on the No. 15 6-1 Cougars. Washington State took its first loss of the season last week, falling 37-3 to Cal. Meanwhile, Colorado snapped a three-game losing streak with a 36-33 win over Oregon State.
